text: The International Golf Institute run by Brad McManus is the place to take your game to the next level. Brad helped nurture me when I was a junior golfer, and taught me in a clear and efficient way, helping me make significant improvements very fast. I now play golf professionally and owe a lot to Brad who set a strong foundation for my game. Brad is an enthusiastic coach who treats every student with care and attention!
My kids and I have been training under coach Abiel for a while now and he has given great advises. We can see much improvements to our swings now!
Glad to have Coach Abiel for my 10 hours lessons. Improve a lot on my swing and posture. Heâ€™s also flexible with the timing.
Brad is the best coach ever.  Understand my needs patiently and provide summary at the end of every lesson.
Coach louis is a very good coach he cares about his students and is very nice. Very good coach
